plays.text: Goal scored by Ryane Clowe (Deflection 18 ft) assisted by Niclas Wallin and Jason Demers

Power Play Goal Scored by Joe Pavelski (Snapshot 18 ft) assisted by Joe Thornton

Shootout attempt by Danny Briere SAVED by Antero Niittymaki (Backhand 7 ft)
Shootout GOAL scored by Logan Couture on Sergei Bobrovsky (Backhand 8 ft)
Shootout attempt by Claude Giroux MISSES wide of net (Snapshot 30 ft)
Shootout GOAL scored by Ryane Clowe on Sergei Bobrovsky (Backhand 8 ft)
